meanings.definition: A food that has been ground or mashed into a thick, smooth consistency.
meanings.sent1: The baby enjoyed eating the purees for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared various purees for the dinner party.
meanings.sent3: The purees on the plate looked like colorful art.
meanings.sent4: Her love for cooking was evident in the flavorful purees she made.
meanings.sent5: The smooth texture of the purees melted in his mouth.

meanings.definition: To grind or mash food into a thick, smooth consistency.
meanings.sent1: She purees the fruits to make a delicious smoothie.
meanings.sent2: The recipe requires you to puree the vegetables before cooking.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally purees the ingredients for the wrong dish.
meanings.sent4: The blender quickly purees the ingredients into a creamy mixture.
meanings.sent5: The chef skillfully purees the soup to perfection.
